Reference

All functions

vos_clear_graph()

Clear all triples from a graph

vos_configure()

Configure Virtuoso Server ini file

vos_connect()

Connect to a Virtuoso Server over ODBC

vos_count_triples()

count triples

vos_delete_db()

Delete Virtuoso Database

vos_destroy_all()

Destroy all Virtuoso's directories

vos_import()

Bulk import of nquads

vos_install()

Helper method for installing Virtuoso Server on Mac OSX

vos_kill()

Stop (kill) the Virtuoso server

vos_list_graphs()

List graphs

vos_log()

Query the server logs

vos_odbcinst()

Configure the ODBC Driver for Virtuoso

vos_process()

Return a handle to an existing Virtuoso Process

vos_query()

Run SPARQL query

vos_start()

Start a Virtuoso Server

vos_status()

Query the server status

vos_uninstall()

Uninstall Virtuoso
